workExperience.title: Chief Technology Officer
workExperience.jobDescription: Leading end-to-end product development and engineering strategy for Skillecta’s AI-driven learning platforms.

workItems.title: AI-Native Learning Platform Development
workItems.description: Driving the architecture, design, and execution of Skillecta’s core learning products. Oversee engineering teams, define technical roadmaps, and ensure rapid delivery of features powered by LLMs, automation, and agent-based workflows.

workItems.title: Engineering Leadership & Execution
workItems.description: Establish engineering processes, set coding standards, and ensure high-velocity development while maintaining quality. Mentor developers and guide the adoption of modern AI-assisted development practices.

workExperience.title: Software Development Consultant
workExperience.jobDescription: Cloud infrastructure and DevOps operations for enterprise-grade applications, focusing on high-availability deployments and automated monitoring systems.

workItems.title: Enterprise Frappe Infrastructure Management
workItems.description: Architect and maintain robust cloud infrastructure for self-hosted Frappe applications, primarily supporting the LendingCube product suite. Implemented high-availability configurations, automated backups, and disaster recovery protocols. Manage multiple in-house applications within the Frappe ecosystem, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance.

workItems.title: N8N Workflow Automation Infrastructure
workItems.description: Design and maintain scalable N8N server infrastructure for workflow automation across multiple products.

workItems.title: Cloud Monitoring & Automation Platform
workItems.description: Developed and maintain comprehensive monitoring dashboards and automation systems for critical services supporting LendingCube and other enterprise products.

workExperience.title: Educator - Python for Finance
workExperience.jobDescription: Delivered comprehensive Python programming curriculum for financial applications, focusing on practical implementation of market analysis tools and AI-driven financial modeling.

workItems.title: Financial Technology Education Program
workItems.description: Led an intensive Python programming course for BCom and BBA students at Rajagiri College of Social Sciences, commissioned by NSE Academy. Developed and delivered curriculum covering stock market fundamentals, automated trading systems, and AI applications in financial analysis. Created hands-on projects including real-time price alert systems and market analysis tools, while managing course logistics through SpaceZee's educational platform.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
workExperience.jobDescription: Spearheaded development of AI-powered automation systems and microservices architecture, significantly improving operational efficiency across multiple enterprise products.

workItems.title: Enterprise Speech-to-Text Platform
workItems.description: Architected and deployed a scalable speech-to-text transcription platform utilizing OpenAI's Whisper model and AWS Transcribe services. Implemented a distributed queue-based architecture to handle high-volume transcription requests. Developed cross-platform browser extensions to streamline the transcription workflow, resulting in a 4 times increase in transcription team productivity.

workItems.title: AI-Powered Image Segmentation Service
workItems.description: Engineered a high-performance image segmentation service using Meta's Segment Anything Model (SAM). Implemented a microservices architecture with RabbitMQ for distributed processing across AWS instances. The system automated image segmentation tasks, reducing manual processing time while maintaining high accuracy.

workItems.title: Legal Document Analysis System
workItems.description: Developed an advanced AI system for automated legal document analysis in the Verify 24x7 background verification platform. Implemented LLM agents to process and summarize court records, FIRs, and legal documents. The system reduced legal team processing time while maintaining high accuracy in document analysis and summary generation.

projects.name: Quiz Master
projects.description: Quiz Master is a multi-user quiz platform built for IIT Madras MAD-II coursework. Users take timed quizzes and track performance while admins manage content. Features include JWT authentication, automated email reminders, monthly reports, Redis caching, and background job processing using Flask and Vue.js.

projects.name: QuantQuest – Paradox ’25, IITM
projects.description: Ideated, designed, and led the development of QuantQuest, a statistics-based strategic game at Paradox ’25, IITM BS Degree's annual tech fest. Built games where participants exploited statistical edges and placed API-based bets using virtual wallets; managed concept design, game logic, API infrastructure, deployment, and logistics.

projects.name: Household Services
projects.description: A multi-user platform for booking home services, where customers can find professionals, book services, and manage requests. Professionals can list services, accept bookings, and manage details, while admins oversee the platform, approve providers, and resolve issues.

projects.name: Business Analysis
projects.description: Data analysis project for a local business (Avocado Juice Bar) with business suggestions based on descriptive analysis.

projects.name: US Senate Roll Call Analysis
projects.description: A descriptive analysis of Roll Call Vote 117th Congress - 1st Session, on the Nomination (Confirmation) of Tiffany P. Cunningham.

projects.name: Vaccine Search
projects.description: A python app to find available slots for covid vaccine(in India) based on some search criteria.

projects.name: Security Tools
projects.description: An app that uses the k-anonymity model API of haveibeenpwned.com to verify whether a password is already in leaked and publicly available lists.

education.degree: BS in Data Science and Applications

certifications.name: Diploma in Data Science
certifications.description: Intermediary Level (Diploma) in the Bachelor's degree program. Coursework covered Mathematics, Statistics, Machine Learning, Business Analytics, and Data Management.

certifications.name: Social Networks
certifications.description: A study of social network graphs and revelation of their properties with the help of python.

certifications.name: Data Science Toolbox
certifications.description: Overview of basic tools that data analysts work with.

certifications.name: Data Science Maths Skills
certifications.description: Introduction to core math and statistics that data science is built upon.

workshops.name: Machine Learning in Medical imaging
workshops.description: Theoretical workshop giving a brief overview of the applications of Machine Learning in diagnosing disease from medical images like MRI, CT Scans, Xrays etc.

workshops.name: Ethical Hacking
workshops.description: Hands-on step by step guide for discovering the vulnerabilities of a system, similar to a simplified version of CTF (Capture The Flag) task.

workshops.name: FOSSMeet
workshops.description: Introduction to Open Source Software possibilities and opportunities. Attended workshops on GoLang and web automation with selenium and python.

workshops.name: PyCEC
workshops.description: Display of Python's power and simplicity with hands-on sessions on Image processing, web scraping, and Machine Learning.
